Home  /  Cutlery / Wusthof / Wusthof-Trident Classic Knives  /  Wusthof Classic Chef's and Cook's Knives

Wusthof Classic 10 inch Chef's Knife

Wusthof Classic 10 inch Chef's Knife

Item Code: 102434

Price Match Guarantee

MetroKitchen will price match the TOTAL current price of any in-stock item from an authorized retail site. Black Friday and Cyber Monday special deals are EXCLUDED.
Price match applies to the TOTAL price, including shipping/handling, gift with purchase and sales taxes.

Price match does not apply to auction sites, sites selling "seconds," or those not authorized by the manufacturer. We must be able to verify the price. Not applicable to previous purchases.

To request a price match, call us at 866-276-4550 and we'll be glad to help you!

Sugg. Price: $222 $179.95

 Item is in stock.
FREE SHIPPING on this item!
Select Quantity:

Have a question? Call us at 866-276-4550

Give us a call

Email: cs@metrokitchen.com

 Shopping with us is safe & secure

The Wusthof Classic 10 inch chef's knife is a great size for chopping and slicing larger meats and vegetables. Chefs with larger hands appreciate its sharpness and good balance. This sharpness of this chefs knife is due to the strength of the German stainless steel which forms the blade. This knife is also forged from a single piece of steel to provide durability. It's built to last with a Wusthof lifetime warranty.

  • Why you'll like:
  • Measurements
  • Care & Use

You can depend on Wusthof Classic knives for long lasting strength because they are forged from one piece of tough, German stainless steel.

  • You can see the impressive German engineering in this forged knife.
  • Crafted with a special stainless steel alloy to help knives retain a sharp edge longer.
  • The metal that forms the blade extends to the end of the handle. It is called a full tang and adds strength and durability.
  • A well-designed bolster, or hand guard, acts as a protective divider between your hand and the sharp blade.
  • 30% sharper and will last 40% longer than ever before, thanks to the latest Wusthof Precision Edge Technology, PEtec. This knife has an extra sharp 28 degree angle.

  • The full length of the knife is 15 1/3 inches
  • Precision forged knife from a single blank of high carbon stainless steel
  • Rockwell hardness rating is 58
  • Hand wash
  • Synthetic handle
  • Lifetime Wusthof guarantee against material and manufacturing defects, with normal use and proper care.
  • Made in Solingen, Germany


MFPN: WU-4582-26
Brand: Wusthof
  • MetroKitchen.com recommends washing your knives by hand; then immediately drying them. Do not let your knives soak in water.
  • Avoid cleaners containing bleach or citrus extracts. They may stain the surface of your knives.
  • Always use a wooden cutting board to preserve blade sharpness. Cutting on hard surfaces such as stone, metal or glass quickly dulls blades.
  • To maintain a sharper cutting edge, use a sharpening steel, preferably each time after you've used a knife.
  • It's best to store your Wusthof knife so its edge and your fingers are protected, preferably in a block or in-drawer knife tray.
  • We suggest using a meat cleaver when you need to cut through bone, otherwise you can damage your knife blade.
  • Lifetime Wusthof guarantee against material and manufacturing defects, with normal use and proper care.
  • Made in Germany
